name: Stay Center
description:
This is a game for the "1 Button Jam", also my first game publish. 

Stay Center ! Don't jump off the edge. Gold man will walk stright in this circle platform. And you could only use SPACE to stop him and spin. Note that the time you hold space key to stop are not count in the time.

THIS IS NOT THE FINAL VERSION !!
The following content will be update in the next version soon.

You can find lucky box on the platform. Although it named as "lucky" box, I felt it is more likely unlucky. Get the box, and you will receive one super power below: 

  • Runing Mode
  • Sonic Spin
  • Spawn Ghost

My best score is 720. Dare you bit my score?
